title: How Technology, AI, and Data Monetisation Are Reshaping the Future of Prop Funding and the Prop Trading Model
description: In the world of finance, the age‑old idea of an individual trader working with firm money – known as proprietary trading – is undergoing a quiet revolution. The dual themes of prop funding (that is, access to firm capital for traders) and the future of prop trading are being rewritten by technology, artificial intelligence (AI) and data […]

title: CBSE to teach AI from Class 3: Are the guardrails ready?

description: YouTuber PewDiePie's artificial intelligence experiment took a dramatic turn. He created an AI council to answer questions. When some bots failed, he threatened deletion. title: West Bengal Police to tie up with AI to curb crimes in state
description: The West Bengal Police have decided to tie up with Artificial Intelligence (AI) to curb crimes, said a police source on Saturday. An AI cell is going to be formed in the police department.
